CN: 阳光令森林更加美丽了。
EN: The sunshine, with no doubt, makes the forest even more beautiful.

CN: 你认识马丁？
EN: Do You know Martin O'Neill?

CN: 马丁在鲁米诺生活了30年，他是鲁米诺所有居民的朋友，包括我的主人在内。
EN: Yes. Martin had lived in Luminor for over 30 years. He was a friend of all residents of Luminor, including my master.

CN: 他是闯入鲁米诺的第一个人类，起初我的主人对此十分不满。
EN: He was the first human to break into Luminor by chance, and at first, my master was very dissatisfied with it.

CN: 马丁是个勇敢善良的人，他帮助并教导我们，带我们了解鲁米诺之外的世界。
EN: But Martin was a brave and kind person who helped and taught us to learn the world outside Luminor.

CN: 我的主人也逐渐改变了他最初的看法，他同意马丁在这里生活。
EN: My master had gradually changed his initial opinion, and he agreed that Martin could stay here.

CN: 他的离去对我们来说是一个巨大的损失。
EN: His departure is a tremendous loss for us.

CN: 我想其他居民们会非常伤心的。
EN: We all gonna be downcast towards the news.

CN: 你提到了你的主人，他是鲁米诺的拥有者吗？
EN: You mentioned your master, is he the owner of Luminor?

CN: 是的，安德烈。他叫塞恩，他是一个神。
EN: Yes, Andre. He calls himself Thain, and he is actually an ancient god with great powers.

CN: 他是一个神？
EN: He is a god?

CN: 是的，但是他的永生带给了他孤独。
EN: Aye, but his immortal brings the eternal loneliness in his soul.

CN: 因此他创造了鲁米诺，又模仿地球生物的模样，创造了我和其他居民。
EN: So he created Luminor and created me, and other residents with similar appearances of creatures on the Earth.

CN: 但他同时又是冷漠和易怒的，大多数时候他对我们不闻不问。
EN: But indifferent and irritable, most of the time he didn't care about us.

CN: 我认为很多居民实际上害怕他。
EN: Many of us were actually afraid of him.

CN: 他的化身之一是山羊，在人类的世界，你们似乎称呼他为“山羊人”。
EN: One of his incarnations takes after a goat. In your world, people seem to call him a "Goatman."

CN: 的确，我在森林入口处看见了山羊人，那就是塞恩？
EN: Indeed, I saw a goatlike man at the entrance to the forest, that's him?

CN: 实际上，那不是塞恩，我的主人至今仍未离开过鲁米诺。
EN: In fact, that wasn't Thain, my master still hasn't left Luminor yet.

CN: 塞恩创造了一群胆小的土拨鼠，但他们能变幻成强大生物的模样，以保护自己。
EN: Thain created a group of timid marmots, which can change appearances into something frightening and powerful to protect themselves.

CN: 当格里姆小镇有收获日的时候，他们总是喜欢变成塞恩的模样，去偷吃一些美食。
EN: When Grim Town celebrates the Harvest Day, they prefer to camouflage themselves, disguise as Thain, to steal some food.

CN: 鲁米诺的动物居民们真是神奇啊。
EN: Wow, that's amazing.

CN: 你好，安德烈。
EN: Nice to meet you, Andre.

CN: 马丁
EN: Martin O'Neill

CN: 主人
EN: Master

CN: 鲁米诺的朋友
EN: Friends at Luminor

CN: 木杖
EN: The staff

CN: 马丁提到他很担心在鲁米诺的朋友们。我好奇我该怎么做才能完成他的遗愿。
EN: Mr. O'Neill mentioned that he was quite worried about his friends at Luminor. I wanna see what I could do to help him.

CN: 马丁是所有鲁米诺居民的朋友，他在7年之前突然离开了鲁米诺，我们都很失落。
EN: Martin was a friend of all Luminor's residents. His sudden leaving 7 years ago begot gloom among us.

CN: 鲁米诺失去了马丁之后，萧瑟破败了许多。
EN: The mood went somber and bleak. Luminor has once again become forgotten and isolated.

CN: 还有很多像我一样的居民们，对马丁逝世的消息一无所知。
EN: There're still many dwellers who know zero about the news of Martin's death.

CN: 他们在这7年间一直处于消极的状态。
EN: They've been in a sorrowful and downcast state for the past 7 years.

CN: 我想马丁将鲁米诺的位置分享于你，也是希望你能重新让鲁米诺恢复生机吧。
EN: Martin must be hoping that you could bring Luminor back to life when sharing the position with you.

CN: 我想我可以试试看。
EN: Okay, I guess I can give it a try.

CN: 马丁曾经居住的木屋就在前方，请不要拘束，你可以在那里住下。
EN: The log cabin where Martin once lived is in front, you're welcome to stay there at any time.

CN: 他离开之前，留下了在这里使用的木杖。
EN: Before he departed, Martin left his staff here. I believe it's still in the cabin.

CN: 我想那会对你很有帮助。
EN: It might be somewhat useful to you.

CN: 亭子上缠绕着藤蔓，看上去有几分萧瑟。
EN: The pavilion is covered with vines, and it looks a bit messy.

CN: 如果你已经找到了木杖，可以去埃隆最西端的回溯点试试看。
EN: Got the staff? Good, you could try it at the western backtracking point in Elon.

CN: 回溯点？那是什么意思？
EN: Backtracking point? What's that?

CN: 时间回溯点。这个木杖被塞恩赋予了魔法。
EN: A place where you can go back to a particular past in timeline. This staff was given magical power by Thain.

CN: 它能带我回到过去？
EN: So you're saying that it could take me back to the past?

CN: 是的，安德烈。在时间回溯点处，用这个木杖敲地三次，你就能回到过去。
EN: Aye, my friend. Knock the ground three times with the staff at the backtracking point, and you'll be sent to an expected past, which the creator of that backtracking point wanted you to see.

CN: 这真是难以置信……我一直以为只有电影或者小说里面才会有这种事情。
EN: That's incredible... I always thought that it would only happen in movies or novels.

CN: 马丁第一次使用的时候也是你这种反应呢。的确，在鲁米诺，一切皆有可能。
EN: When Martin first used it, his reaction was the same as yours. But everything is possible in Luminor.

CN: 还记得你刚走进鲁米诺的地方吗？那里是鲁米诺的辖区之一埃隆的最西端。
EN: Remember where you first came in? It's the western end of Elon, part of Luminor.

CN: 从那的岔路进去，你就能发现一个时间回溯点。
EN: Go to another fork in the road, and you shall find a backtracking point.

CN: 丹尼
安德烈
